system_overview: Central synthesis hub (WAG: Words Assemble Geometries) integrating all semester projects via a crucial architectural insight: LLM manages void (possibility space) rather than constructing scenes directly.

mindsets_paradigms.target: LLM as void architect; prepares possibility spaces that user instantiates
mindsets_paradigms.intervention: Fundamental reframe of AI creative tool design

organizing_principles.current: Trail data as exhaust; invisible byproduct
organizing_principles.target: Trail as artifact; documentation as primary output

information_flows.current: LLM outputs ephemeral; scene state not captured
information_flows.target: disc-data.json exports structured state; shareable without API

system_infrastructure.current: Require API access to generate/modify scenes
system_infrastructure.intervention: ONYX Studio as trail-aware export tool

void_management_architecture.problem: Fine-grain LLM scene construction frustrating; model hallucinates specifics
void_management_architecture.insight: LLM should prepare possibility space (void), not construct scene directly
void_management_architecture.mechanism: LLM describes constraints, options, branching possibilities; user selects/instantiates
void_management_architecture.benefit: Preserves user agency; reduces API calls; enables export without LLM access

dynamic_processes.embedded_values: AI tool culture values generation; 'AI makes things for you'
dynamic_processes.process_redesign_opportunity: AI prepares; user chooses; agency preserved

social_positionalities.safety_concerns: Void management reduces API dependency and lock-in
social_positionalities.legitimized_expertise: Shifts expertise from prompting to curating voids

invisible_work.emotional_labor: Frustration with scene construction before insight clicked
invisible_work.unrecognized_labor: Dead ends, rewrites, debugging—invisible in final system

embedded_systems.policies: Terms of service for LLM providers
embedded_systems.economic_logics: API monetization captures value from user labor

phase_0_tilth.lesson: Worlds accumulate context faster than coherence

phase_3_tractor.outcome: Crucial architectural insight; enables ONYX export

integrated_intervention_strategies.infrastructure_work: LLM prepares possibility space; user instantiates; exports work standalone
Structured scene state that persists; others can load/modify without API

integrated_intervention_strategies.intervention: Develop ONYX Studio as trail-aware tool
integrated_intervention_strategies.infrastructure_work: Level 2 trail integration: architecture built around trail visibility from start
Restructure prompts for lower-cost models; reduce API dependency entirely

invisible_trail: 'Crucial insight' moment when void management clicked

meta_rule: Analyze AI creative tools by asking: Where should LLM agency end and user agency begin (void vs. scene), AND what infrastructural conditions (API economics, export formats, trail visibility) determine whether AI collaboration produces ephemeral outputs or durable, shareable artifacts?
